name: Zasaword
description:
Letters will randomly appear in the Letter Bag on the bottom left.  Drag them to the Word Rack to form words, or save them in Storage for later use.  Make as many words as you can in 2.5 minutes.

Tips:

Longer words are worth more.

There will be a Bonus Multiplier slot for every word.  Try to place high value letters in the x5 slot.

If you get stuck waiting for a letter, try using the Wildcard Button on the top of the screen.  Wildcards aren't worth any points, but can get you out of a jam  up to 4 times per round.
